item.title: By: Meg
item.dc:creator: Meg
item.description: Oh this is delightful! I'm planning my little girls' first birthday so need more pink ideas (of course pink) so thank you! As an Aussie in London seeing musk sticks was a blast from the past and on my list for my mum to bring over along with the Tim Tams! This looks lovely, thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded: Oh this is delightful! I’m planning my little girls’ first birthday so need more pink ideas (of course pink) so thank you! As an Aussie in London seeing musk sticks was a blast from the past and on my list for my mum to bring over along with the Tim Tams! This looks lovely, thanks for sharing!

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: Anita, what a beautiful display of your talents!! Also beautifully photographed. I am sure everyone enjoyed the fruits of your labour :)
